query: What was the estimated downtime in the original proposal Q-11876?
output:
CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: What was the estimated downtime in the original proposal Q-11876?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[3. Murtaza Hassan - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Q: You confirmed in that letter that Gulfstream was “unable to meet the Aircraft’s original estimated return to service,” citing “discrepancies”?

[331-463.pdf, p.35]
when they will be sent and estimated arrival into St Louis I will advise.

[331-463.pdf, p.49]
Due to the excessive scope growth estimated at 12,000 hours, incoming scheduled aircraft for this crew

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]
That proposal estimated downtime of 35–45 working days?

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]
It did not include estimated downtime for discrepancy-related repairs?

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]
A range of estimated discrepancies ($250K–$400K).

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]
In August 2024, Gulfstream wrote to CITIOM that “based upon our current projection, the estimated completion date will likely be in mid-November,” and that 20,000 additional manhours had been added. That letter is GAC0039517.

[1-110.pdf, p.5]
Since April 2024, the estimated return to service (RTS) date has been continually postponed

[1-110.pdf, p.5]
RTS was planned for March 29th, with an estimated maximum ground time of 45

[1-110.pdf, p.5]
estimated date set for January 6th, 2025.

[7. Leonard B - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Confirm Beauchemin believes MROs like Gulfstream owe no duty of care to customers in forecasting labor hours or downtime.

[7. Leonard B - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Confirm the final tally was over 26,000 hours and nearly 10 months of downtime.

[7. Leonard B - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Q: Are you aware Gulfstream rolled out a new downtime analytics tool in July 2023?

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
Gulfstream performed over 20 comparable inspections at St. Louis with downtime far exceeding 35–45 days.

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
3. “It’s not standard to estimate discrepancy downtime”
